'''Anders Blixt''' (born [[20 March]] [[1959]]) is a prolific Swedish game designer. He co-authored several supplements for the ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'' game during the 1990s,<ref>{{webcite|author=Pontus Löf|articleurl=http://www.runan.info/anders-blixt-ett-legendariskt-namn/|articlename=Anders Blixt – ett legendariskt namn|dated=15 September 2000|website=[http://www.runan.info/ Rollspelstidningen Runan]|accessed=4 July 2013}}</ref> and occasionally writes about topics related to [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s [[legendarium]] at his blog (in English). 

==Bibliography, selected==
===Books===
*[[1990]]: ''[[Gorgoroth (book)|Gorgoroth]]'' (co-author)
*[[1995]]: ''[[The Kin-strife]]'' (co-author)
*[[1996]]: ''[[Southern Gondor: The Land]]'' (co-author)
*[[1996]]: ''[[Southern Gondor: The People]]'' (co-author)

===Articles===
*[[1993]]: [[Other Hands 1|''Other Hands'' 1]]
**"Beyond the Third Age: Roleplaying in all ages of Arda"
*[[2012]]: ''Fenix'', nr. 1
**"Midgård Noir" (campaigning in Umbar during the Fourth Age)
*[[2012]]: ''Fenix'', nr. 6
**"Yxtid, Stormtid!" (about Dwarves during the War of the Ring)
